hero.title: Links that boost your conversions on <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin>
hero.description: Stop losing potential customers with traditional links. Direct links open your contents in the right mobile app, increasing conversion rates by a lot.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.heading: Why you're losing conversions
problem.description: Every time you share a link on LinkedIn that should open in a mobile app or the native browser, you're losing potential customers and engagement.

more.description1: No one wants to be trapped in a mini-browser integrated into an app (like LinkedIn or Instagram). Your visitors don't either.
more.description2: Users are frustrated for many reasons, including social accounts disconnection, payment processors not working, etc. Most people abandon before subscribing or buying.
more.description3: Traditional links create friction in the user journey, damaging your brand reputation and reducing engagement rates.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.heading: Share direct links with pim.ms
solution.description: <logo>PIMMS</logo> detects which app should open your link and sends users directly there, creating a seamless experience that increases conversion rates.

more.description1: Automatically detects the user's device and opens the link in the most appropriate mobile application.
more.description2: Visitors stay engaged since they use those apps daily and are already logged in. As a result, you get much more conversions
more.description3: Track user journeys and click rates to optimize your marketing campaigns.

offer_details.title: Early access to <logo>PIMMS</logo>
offer_details.description: Stop losing sales on your website - start with 3 free direct links today.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.heading: Why you're losing subscribers
problem.description: Every time your YouTube links don't open in the official YouTube app, you're losing new subscribers.

more.description1: No one wants to be trapped in a mini-browser integrated into an app (like LinkedIn or Instagram). Your visitors don't either.
more.description2: Users are frustrated for many reasons, because they are not connected to YouTube on those mini-browsers. Most people abandon before subscribing, commenting or liking.
more.description3: Traditional links create friction in the user journey, damaging your online reputation and reducing engagement rates.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.heading: Share direct links with pim.ms
solution.description: <logo>PIMMS</logo> detects your operating system and opens your video in the official YouTube app downloaded from the Google Play Store or App Store.

more.description1: Automatically detects the user's device and opens the link in the most appropriate mobile application.
more.description2: Viewers stay engaged since they use this official YouTube app daily and are already logged in. As a result, you get much more subscribers and engagement.
more.description3: Track your click rates easily with our dashboard.
